title: Black med helm

properties.value: A black med helm is the sixth-strongest med helm. It requires a Defence level of 10 to wear, and can be purchased from Seddu's Adventurers' Store in Nardah for 576 coins. It can be received as an uncommon drop from dark warriors, and a common drop from mutated bloodvelds. It can also be obtained through shade burning, and is quite commonly found at the Digsite.

Item ID1151

A black med helm is the sixth-strongest med helm. It requires a Defence level of 10 to wear, and can be purchased from Seddu's Adventurers' Store in Nardah for 576 coins. It can be received as an uncommon drop from dark warriors, and a common drop from mutated bloodvelds. It can also be obtained through shade burning, and is quite commonly found at the Digsite.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-3+0
 Defence bonuses
+9+10+8-1+9
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+0List
